content.body: interesting feedback on observables from the W3C TAG:  https://github.com/w3ctag/design-reviews/issues/902#issuecomment-1942576159
Is anyone interested in discussing Observables in TC39, as Lea recommends?
ljharb was definitely interested in seeing it go through TC39 IIRC
